because entering so many new markets uh

was the only player in the market that

started to grow but also where we needed
to be in a couple of years using AWS
makes us be able to roll out a new

even months with a traditional uh
collocation facility as we can start
where small with the AWS region uh that

to operate in all regions even at low
scale so not only are we saving money
but we're also increasing performance or

collect billions and billions of

from more than 30,000 of our publisher

across regions that gets transferred

use Amazon Route 53 latency low
balancing to make sure that all these
billions and billions of audience data

region that make sure that all our

lowest latency possible we use Amazon

regions become one single mesh uh of

any other region uh the reason that we
do this is to make sure that we have all
